title: Audio Bug on Mafia Jinx's Dance
body:
When using Mafia Jinx and preforming the /dance emote. Normally the record player would pop out and the music player would play the music and ta da music. Now with 5.11, the music no longer plays and she is just dancing to silence 

It happens every time on every map

-Swizzle

replies.body:
Oh hai Swizzle! 

Thanks for the report! We're working to fix this!
